title: Panic of 1907
description: Banking crisis triggers creation of the Fed in 1913; severe market selloff.

title: Federal Reserve Act
description: Creates the Federal Reserve System; reshapes monetary policy framework.

title: U.S. Enters World War I
description: Congress declares war on Germany; defense mobilization ramps.

title: Stock Market Crash of 1929
description: Black Tuesday; onset of the Great Depression.

title: Emergency Banking Act / New Deal Launch
description: Bank holiday and early New Deal—large fiscal interventions begin.

title: Social Security Act
description: Establishes old-age benefits and unemployment insurance.

title: Pearl Harbor
description: U.S. enters World War II; defense outlays surge.

title: Korean War Begins
description: U.S. commits forces under UN; defense spending increases.

title: Interstate Highway Act
description: Launches Federal-Aid Highway Program; long-run infrastructure outlays.

title: Medicare & Medicaid Enacted
description: Large new mandatory programs established.

title: Nixon Ends Gold Convertibility
description: ‘Nixon shock’—Bretton Woods effectively ends; macro regime shift.

title: OPEC Oil Embargo
description: First oil shock; inflation spikes; recession follows.

title: Second Oil Shock
description: Iranian Revolution drives energy prices higher.

title: Economic Recovery Tax Act (ERTA)
description: Large tax cuts; supply-side era begins.

title: Tax Reform Act of 1986
description: Broaden base, lower rates; major code overhaul.

title: Gulf Crisis / Desert Shield
description: Iraq invades Kuwait; U.S. mobilization begins.

title: 9/11 Attacks
description: Terror attacks; homeland security spending rises.

title: Lehman Brothers Collapse
description: Acute phase of Global Financial Crisis.

title: American Recovery and Reinvestment Act
description: Fiscal stimulus for post-crisis recovery.

title: Budget Control Act
description: Spending caps and sequestration framework.

title: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act (TCJA)
description: Corporate and individual rate changes; base broadening.

title: CARES Act
description: COVID-19 relief: direct payments, PPP, expanded UI.

title: Inflation Reduction Act
description: Energy/climate investments; health and tax provisions.

title: Russia Invades Ukraine
description: War in Europe; defense and aid outlays increase.
